description:
For efficient touring in varied terrain, a wide platform offers float in deep snow, while the air core is light enough for extended exploration. The extra width and metal edges provide controlled turning and confident descents on harder snow and steeper trails. Positrack thermomoulded waxless bases offer good grip and glide without having to carry skins or decipher conditions that are tough to wax for.

  • Wood and air channel core is light enough for climbing and strong enough for crud busting
  • Activ'Cap construction ensures the ski is flexible and has freedom of movement at tip and tail to float and glide over uneven terrain
  • Moderately rockered tip floats in powder and crud and allows for easy turn initiation
  • Full metal edges for extra control in varied snow conditions
  • Positrack thermomoulded waxless bases offer grip without skins
name: Rossignol XP-100 Positrack Skis
